reviews.customers_say: Customers find this turtleneck sweater comfortable and well-constructed, with one noting its silky modal fabric that's not scratchy. Customers like the color accuracy, with one describing it as a blue-based muted forest green, and they appreciate its warmth, with one mentioning it's thick enough to keep them warm during cooler weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this top!
items.body: Very soft and very comfortable. The neck is nice and stretchy, so it doesn't feel like it is constraining. I ordered 2 more in different colors. If there were more colors, I would get a couple more. Ordered a medium when I usually order a small. Fits well, but not so snug it shows "everything." Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice purchase
items.body: It's heavier than I expected, but that turns out to be quite nice. I bought it for layering, so although "Amazon" recommended I purchase a large size, I opted for the medium, and I'm glad I did, as it fits well for that purpose, but doesn't look "too tight." The neck is quite stretchy, and doesn't feel binding in any way. I'm happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous soft sweater but LONG and clingy
items.body: The softness and weight and color are awesome. Super comfy. Unfortunately it is way too long on my 5'4" body - mid thigh long. And because it is wonderfully light and body clingy, it shows every Body flaw to the max! I had to return it, but quality is lovely, if you are tall, and very "flaw" free. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Versatile Turtleneck!
items.body: This slim-fit turtleneck sweater is such a great find! The blue color is gorgeous and really makes my eyes pop. The material is lightweight with a subtle striped texture, and it feels soft and comfortable. It hits right at the hips, so it looks great worn untucked or tucked in for a more polished look. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own! Read more
items.author: Tara - Fashionably Affordable Outfits

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable. Perfect and flattering fit.
items.body: I have to admit I'm usually not a fan of Amazon Essential wear, but this was so nice I ordered two more in other colors. The fit is comfortable and flattering. The fabric is very soft. It's thick enough to keep me warm during cooler weather, but I can wear it with a vest or jacket over it when the bitter cold of winter arrives. I washed it and then tumble dried it on low. No shrinkage, it kept its color and no streaking of color. Very happy with this turtleneck! Read more
items.author: Traci

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it but…
items.body: I ordered the light blue and loved it so much that I ordered a pink. The pink is like a different sweater. The neck is not a turtle much, the sleeves are different, and there are slits in the side. I like both sweaters, they are soft, the fit is nice, the colors are great. But it’s weird that I got two different versions. Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and fit
items.body: Always leery of the "Amazon" brand for clothing but this turtleneck "sweater" is super nice. It is a thicker ribbed sort of material- not a thin rib knit like a tank top, but I hesitate to call it a true sweater as it's not that thick. I like mine to be form fitting to wear under things if so inclined so I ordered a medium and that was the perfect fit. For context, I typically wear a medium-large t-shirt. It has an enormous amount of stretch so keep that in mind. Sleeves are nice and long, the neck didn't stretch out during the day and become saggy. Honestly I like it better than my Old Navy turtleneck. I ordered this also in hot pink. For the price you can't beat these. Read more
items.author: Keriwhit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful turtleneck!!!
items.body: This turtleneck sweater is of the highest quality! I bought the blue in a medium and it fits perfectly. It washes and dries perfectly. Does not shrink or lose its shape. I am 5'1 137 lbs. I'm going back for another color! Read more
items.author: Carol VA Girl

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Gold, Forest Green, Bright Pink, Cherry Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
